Select a dimension below and then click and drag on the image to select the portion of the image you wish to crop.
Switches between portrait and landscape orientation

Click, hold and drag the mouse around each eye separately to select it. A selection box appears over the area. Release the mouse to complete your selection. The photo is displayed with the red eye removed.
Exit Red Eye repair without applying effect
Apply effect and exit Red- Eye repair
Click to select the area to fix. Then, move the mouse to see a preview of the replacement area. Click the image again to finalise. Lather, rinse, repeat. Note: You can use Ctrl-drag to pan.
Apply fixes and exit Retouch tool
Exit Retouch tool without applying edits
Allows you to pick a neutral grey or white part of the photo to remove colour cast

The items selected with a tick above will be included on your Gift CD. To add more items, click the "Add More..." button below.
Create a set or use an existing one
Choose folders & albums to back up
A backup set records where to store backed-up files and it also keeps a record of which files have been backed up already, so you don't have to back them up again.
Picasa is now showing the files that you have not previously backed up.
Tick the folders that you want to back up or choose 'Select All' to choose everything.
Selected folder and/or albums will be uploaded
Selected folders and/or albums will be updated online with the options specified in the menus to the right
Selected folders and/or albums will be removed from Picasa Web Albums
Selected folders and/or albums will be removed from Picasa Web Albums

Additional storage can allow you to upload more photos
Choose action for selected folders and albums:
Picasa is now only showing folders and albums containing photos that you have not previously uploaded.
Picasa is now only showing folders and albums containing photos already online which do not match the options that you have selected.
Picasa is now showing only folders and albums containing photos already online.
After this upload, you will be using all your storage.
You need more storage to upload all that!
